entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:50 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
